heading: HB00506
0: AN ACT PENALIZING AGE DISCRIMINATION IN EMPLOYMENT PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Anti-age Discrimination In Employment Act Of 2016
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00506
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PENALIZING AGE DISCRIMINATION IN EMPLOYMENT PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Anti-age Discrimination In Employment Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Declares it unlawful to discriminate against employees, job seekers and trainees by reason of age.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Montoro (000 2017-11-23)2. Del Mar (000 2017-11-23)
3. Batocabe (000 2017-10-03)4. Nieto (000 2018-02-07)
5. Panganiban (000 2018-02-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2016-07-27
